name: Torotoga
description:
Description:

Torotoga Life Is A Game That You Could Appreciate Because Of It's Attention For Detail In Videogames. Only Walking Around, Being Amazed By The Atmosphere Of The Game Was My Goal. It Tries To Recreate The Same Feeling That You Would Get By Looking At A Beautiful Landscape In Any Adventure Game...

Controls:

LMB: Walking / RMB: Take Photo

Installation:

1. Download Either The "Torotoga.exe" Or The "Torotoga ZIP".

2. If You Have Downloaded The "Torotoga.exe", Double Click On It And It Will Automatically Be Installed. If You Have Downloaded The "Torotoga ZIP", You Have To Unzip It. Either With Windows ZIP, WinRAR, 7z, Etc. Wich Programm You Use Is Your Own Choice.

3. Play The game! (For "Torotoga ZIP" You Have To Open The Executable File! "Torotoga.exe" Will Start Immediately After Installation.)

(4. If Any Problems Occur, Please Write Them In This Comment Section!)

Note:

This Game Is In Pretty Early Development And It Is The First One That Actually Motivates Me To Move On.
